|vo_08_03_rm_s       = Déng nǐ yǒu kòng, wǒmen yīqǐ qù zhǎo Lìshā ba! Tā shàngcì hé wǒ jiǎngle yīgè Lóngjí Xuěshān bǎozàng de gùshì, zhǐ jiǎng dào yībàn. Wǔ, wǒ hái xiǎng zhīdào hòuxù!
|vo_08_03_rm_t       = Déng nǐ yǒu kòng, wǒmen yīqǐ qù zhǎo Lìshā ba! Tā shàngcì hàn wǒ jiǎngle yīgè Lóngjí Xuěshān bǎozàng de gùshì, zhǐ jiǎng dào yībàn. Wǔ, wǒ hái xiǎng zhīdào hòuxù!
|vo_08_03_tl         = When you're free, let's go and see Lisa together! Last time, she told me a story about treasure in Dragonspine Mountain, and we only got halfway. I want to know the next chapter!

|vo_08_07_rm         = Ǹg? Bānnítè... Hǎoxiàng zài nálǐ tīng guò... o! Nǐ shuō de shì Màoxiǎn-jiā Xiéhuì nàge rèxuè de nánháizǐ a! Ǹg, wǒ yǒushí huì zài Mìjìng fùjìn jiàndào tā, hǎoxiàng duì xúnbǎo hěn yǒu rèqíng ne.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Mmm? Bennett... I feel like I've heard that somewhere before... Oh! You mean the impulsive boy from the Adventurers' Guild! Mmm, I occasionally see him close to Domains, he seems very passionate about treasure-hunting.

|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 可莉呀，偶尔会有点调皮，但骑士团的大家都很喜欢她！唔…为了不让她又被琴抓去关禁闭，还是看紧她一点吧。
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 可莉呀，偶爾會有點調皮，但騎士團的大家都很喜歡她！唔…為了不讓她又被琴抓去關禁閉，還是看緊她一點吧。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Kělì ya, ǒu'ěr huì yǒudiǎn tiáopí, dàn Qíshì-tuán de dàjiā dōu hěn xǐhuān tā! Wǔ... Wèile bù ràng tā yòu bèi Qín zhuā qù guān jìnbì, háishì kànjǐn tā yīdiǎn ba.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Ah, Klee may be a little naughty sometimes, but everyone in the Knights of Favonius really likes her! Oh... To prevent her from being caught and locked in solitary confinement by Jean again, [we] should probably still keep a closer eye on her.

|vo_08_09_title_s    = 关于阿贝多…

|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 阿贝多，大多数时候都呆在自己的工坊里，捣鼓一些很厉害的东西。但是，见到他的时候，会有种猜不透他在想些什么的感觉。嗯，猜不透呢…
|vo_08_09_tx_t       = 阿貝多，大多數時候都待在自己的工坊裡，搞一些很厲害的東西。但是，見到他的時候，會有種猜不透他在想些什麼的感覺。嗯，猜不透呢…
|vo_08_09_rm_s       = Ābèiduō, dàduōshù shíhòu dōu dāi zài zìjǐ de gōngfáng lǐ, dǎogǔ yīxiē hěn lìhài de dōngxi. Dànshì, jiàn dào tā de shíhòu, huì yǒu zhǒng cāi bù tòu tā zài xiǎng xiē shénme de gǎnjué. Ǹg, cāi bù tòu ne...
|vo_08_09_rm_t       = 
|vo_08_09_tl         = Albedo idles in his workshop most of the time, fiddling with some really impressive stuff. Although, whenever I see him, I feel like I can't figure out what he's thinking about. Mmm, [he truly is] enigmatic...

|vo_08_12_tx_s       = 柯莱和我写信说，她的「魔鳞病」已经彻底康复…我太为她高兴了！真想下一秒就飞到她身边，紧紧地抱住她。她还说很想念蒙德的大家，想等哪一天独当一面之后，亲口来汇报自己的成长…啊，要是能赶上下一次羽球节就好了，我都快等不及了！
|vo_08_12_tx_t       = 柯萊寫信給我說，她的「魔鱗病」已經徹底康復…我太為她高興了！真想下一秒就飛到她身邊，緊緊地抱住她。她還說很想念蒙德的大家，想等哪一天獨當一面之後，親口來彙報自己的成長…啊，要是能趕上下一次羽球節就好了，我都快等不及了！
|vo_08_12_rm         = 
|vo_08_12_tl         =

|vo_08_13_tx_t       = 哦，米卡是優菈那邊的老隊員了，最初可能是看我和優菈關係比較好吧，總是長官長官地叫我。在我跟他分享自己的偵察心得之後，他又改叫我前輩了…弄得我滿不好意思的。明明我們的職責不一樣，他在繪製地圖上的專業性，是我怎麼都比不上的。

|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 我因为爷爷才加入骑士团，又因为琴留在了团里。现在，是你陪我见到了蒙德以外的天空。我真的很开心。
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 我因為爺爺才加入騎士團，又因為琴留在了團裡。現在，是{{MC|你|妳}}陪我見到了蒙德以外的天空。我真的很開心。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Wǒ yīnwèi yéye cái jiārù Qíshì-tuán, yòu yīnwèi Qín liú zài le tuán lǐ. Xiànzài, shì nǐ péi wǒ jiàn dào le Méngdé yǐ wài de tiānkōng. Wǒ zhēn de hěn kāixīn.
|vo_09_04_tl         = I joined the Knights because of my grandfather, and I stayed in the Knights because of Jean. Now, it is you who has accompanied me to see the skies beyond Mondstadt. I really am very happy.

|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其五

|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 我还想去更远的世界。我想去看天空的尽头！你也会继续陪着我的，对吧、对吧？
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 我還想去更遠的世界。我想去看天空的盡頭！{{MC|你|妳}}也會繼續陪著我的，對吧、對吧？

|vo_08_03_tx_s       = 等你有空，我们一起去找丽莎吧！她上次和我讲了一个龙脊雪山宝藏的故事，只讲到一半。唔，我还想知道后续！

|vo_08_03_rm_s       = Déng nǐ yǒu kòng, wǒmen yīqǐ qù zhǎo Lìshā ba! Tā shàngcì hé wǒ jiǎngle yīgè Lóngjí-xuěshān bǎozàng de gùshì, zhǐ jiǎng dào yībàn. Wǔ, wǒ hái xiǎng zhīdào hòuxù!
|vo_08_03_rm_t       = Déng nǐ yǒu kòng, wǒmen yīqǐ qù zhǎo Lìshā ba! Tā shàngcì hàn wǒ jiǎngle yīgè Lóngjí Xuěshān bǎozàng de gùshì, zhǐ jiǎng dào yībàn. Wǔ, wǒ hái xiǎng zhīdào hòuxù!
|vo_08_03_tl         = When you're free, let's go and see Lisa together! Last time, she told me a story about treasure in Dragonspine Mountain, and we only got halfway. I want to know the next chapter!

|vo_08_04_tx_s       = 丽莎好像除了睡觉的时间之外都在看书！真厉害啊，我就坐不住那么长时间。
|vo_08_04_tx_t       = 麗莎好像除了睡覺的時間之外都在看書！真厲害啊，我就坐不住那麼長時間。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Lìshā hǎoxiàng chúle shuìjiào de shíjiān zhī wài dōu zài kānshū! Zhēn lìhài a, wǒ jiù zuò bùzhù nàme cháng shíjiān.
|vo_08_04_tl         = It feels as though whenever Lisa's not sleeping, she's reading! How incredible, I wouldn't be able to sit still for such a long time.

|vo_08_07_rm_s       = Ǹg? Bānnítè... Hǎoxiàng zài nálǐ tīng guò... ó! Nǐ shuō de shì Màoxiǎn-jiā Xiéhuì nà gè rèxuè de nánháizǐ a! Ǹg, wǒ yǒushí huì zài mìjìng fùjìn jiàn dào tā, hǎoxiàng duì xúnbǎo hěn yǒu rèqíng ne.
|vo_08_07_rm_t       = Ǹg? Bānnítè... Hǎoxiàng zài nálǐ tīng guò... ó! Nǐ shuō de shì Màoxiǎn-jiā Xiéhuì nà gè rèxiě de nánháizǐ a! Ǹg, wǒ yǒushí huì zài mìjìng fùjìn jiàn dào tā, hǎoxiàng duì xúnbǎo hěn yǒu rèqíng ne.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Mmm? Bennett... I feel like I've heard that somewhere before... Oh! You mean the impulsive boy from the Adventurers' Guild! Mmm, I occasionally see him close to Domains, he seems very passionate about treasure-hunting.

|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 可莉呀，偶尔会有点调皮，但骑士团的大家都很喜欢她！唔…为了不让她又被琴抓去关禁闭，还是看紧她一点吧。

|vo_08_08_rm         = Kělì ya, ǒu'ěr huì yǒudiǎn tiáopí, dàn Qíshì-tuán de dàjiā dōu hěn xǐhuān tā! Wǔ... Wèile bù ràng tā yòu bèi Qín zhuā qù guān jìnbì, háishì kàn jǐn tā yīdiǎn ba.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Ah, Klee may be a little naughty sometimes, but everyone in the Knights of Favonius really likes her! Oh... To prevent her from being caught and locked in solitary confinement by Jean again, [we] should probably still keep a closer eye on her.

|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 阿贝多，大多数时候都呆在自己的工坊里，捣鼓一些很厉害的东西。但是，见到他的时候，会有种猜不透他在想些什么的感觉。嗯，猜不透呢…

|vo_08_09_rm_s       = Ābèiduō, dàduōshù shíhòu dōu dāi zài zìjǐ de gōngfáng lǐ, dǎogǔ yīxiē hěn lìhài de dōngxi. Dànshì, jiàn dào tā de shíhòu, huì yǒu zhǒng cāi bù tòu tā zài xiǎng xiē shénme de gǎnjué. Ǹg, cāi bù tòu ne...
|vo_08_09_rm_t       = 
|vo_08_09_tl         = Albedo idles in his workshop most of the time, fiddling with some really impressive stuff. Although, whenever I see him, I feel like I can't figure out what he's thinking about. Mmm, [he truly is] enigmatic...

|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III

|vo_09_03_tx_s       = 其实我不擅长解谜，羽球节里看到猜谜的摊位都要绕着走…你呢？
|vo_09_03_tx_t       = 其實我不擅長解謎，羽球節裡看到猜謎的攤位都要繞著走…{{MC|你|妳}}呢？
|vo_09_03_rm         = Qíshí wǒ bù shàncháng jiěmí, yǔqiú-jié lǐ kàn dào cāimí de tānwèi dōu yào rào zhe zǒu... Nǐ ne?

|vo_09_04_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其四
|vo_09_04_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其四
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 我因为爷爷才加入骑士团，又因为琴留在了团里。现在，是你陪我见到了蒙德以外的天空。我真的很开心。
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 我因為爺爺才加入騎士團，又因為琴留在了團裡。現在，是{{MC|你|妳}}陪我見到了蒙德以外的天空。我真的很開心。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Wǒ yīnwèi yéye cái jiārù Qíshì-tuán, yòu yīnwèi Qín liú zài le tuán lǐ. Xiànzài, shì nǐ péi wǒ jiàn dào le Méngdé yǐ wài de tiānkōng. Wǒ zhēn de hěn kāixīn.
|vo_09_04_tl         = I joined the Knights because of my grandfather, and I stayed in the Knights because of Jean. Now, it is you who has accompanied me to see the skies beyond Mondstadt. I really am very happy.
|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其五
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 我还想去更远的世界。我想去看天空的尽头！你也会继续陪着我的，对吧、对吧？
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 我還想去更遠的世界。我想去看天空的盡頭！{{MC|你|妳}}也會繼續陪著我的，對吧、對吧？
|vo_09_05_rm         = Wǒ hái xiǎng qù gèng yuǎn de shìjiè, wǒ xiǎng qù kàn tiānkōng de jìntóu! Nǐ yě huì jìxù péi zhe wǒ de, duì ba, duì ba?
|vo_09_05_tl         = I still want to go further in the world, I want to see the ends of the sky! You will continue to accompany me, right, right?

|vo_11_01_tx_s       = 嘿嘿嘿，生日快乐！来，这个给你，是我亲手缝的「兔兔伯爵・特别定制版」…放心放心，是特别定制版哦，不会爆炸的！

|vo_11_01_rm         = Hēiheihei, shēngrì-kuàilè! Lái, zhège gěi nǐ, shì wǒ qīnshǒu féng de "Tùtù Bójué - Tèbié Dìngzhì Bǎn"... Fàngxīn fàngxīn, shì tèbié dìngzhì bǎn ó, bùhuì bàozhà de!
|vo_11_01_tl         = Hehehe, happy birthday! Here, this is for you. It's a "Baron Bunny - Special Version" that I hand-made! ...Relax, it's a special version, so it won't explode!

|vo_12_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04 (1.0).ogg
|vo_12_04_tx_s       = 我现在…比起最初跟你认识的时候，又进步了不少吧。嘿嘿，非常感谢！让我请你吃蜜酱胡萝卜煎肉吧，跟我来跟我来！

|vo_12_04_rm         = Wǒ xiànzài... bǐ qǐ zùi chū gēn nǐ rènshì dè shíhòu, yòu jìnbùle bùshǎo ba. Hēihei, fēicháng gǎnxiè! Ràng wǒ qǐng nǐ chī Mìjiàng Húlúobo Jiānròu ba, gēn wǒ lái gēn wǒ lái!
|vo_12_04_tl         = Compared to when I first met you, I have probably improved quite a bit. Hehe, many thanks! I'll treat you to some Sticky Honey Roast, follow me follow me!
